content:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/94089 points out that the breadcrumbs at the top of the page are an important navigation element (the way to get to a parent modules), but they aren't styled like links. I think that makes sense, and we should give them the same color that other hyperlinks in the page use.

Thoughts?
I'm not convinced by the argument but I'm waiting a demo to see what it looks like.
